comment: The best professor I have ever had at this institution Professor Stewart cares about each individual in the class and about providing each person with a good educational experience. Professor Stewart challenges you to do better and grow. He is encouraging and very knowledgeable about the subject.

I loved professor Stewart so much!! He was extremely kind, passionate about the material, and genuinely helped all of his students grow in their confidence with public speaking. I would absolutely recommend taking his class! He was the sweetest and most kind hearted professor I have ever had :)

I was very nervous about this class because I hate public speaking. However, he was very kind and reassuring. He does not grade hard at all and believes the important part is you simply just getting up and talking. If you have anxiety with this kind of stuff, I highly recommend him.

Dr. Stewart is one of the most passionate professors at KSU. He knows everyone by name and cares about your success. Tests are straight forward and open note. Easy quizzes every couple of weeks. Two easy group projects with time in class to work together. Lectures are long, but he tries his best to make it interesting. Man deserves a raise!

Prof Stewart was great! Always willing to help and answer all questions quickly. He loves what he does and as long as he changes someones outlook in public speaking he feels accomplished! I got an A in this class. Just make sure to get the workbook so you can prep for speeches. It really made me enjoy it and not as nervous as before. TAKE HIM
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Bob is amazing, one of my favorite Professors at KSU! He is very caring and will work with you for anything. There isnt much outside work except for when you have a speech but even those are fun and you get to pic whatever you want basically. If you have the chance TAKE THIS CLASS
If he is available I highly recommend you take him. He is a very caring and understanding professor. The speech topics that he gives are fun and you have a lot of room to be creative.

The class is designed to make you succeed. This class makes me feel so empowered after seing improvement. All it takes is standing up for some fear. The fear is not very lasting because the professor would not allow any embarrassing things happening and he is very motivational. He is very into the class, he knows a lot, he has a genuine interest.

Professor Stewart is literally the most amazing professor I've ever had at KSU, he is so kind and truly cares about each of his students. He is not a hard grader and is willing to work with you to make sure you succeed. TAKE HIM IF YOU CAN!!!
Bob is an amazing professor and cares so much about his students! The material can be boring, but he does his best to make it fun and relatable.

Rob is the best. He understands that his class is not the most exciting material, but he does what he can to make it fun. He is very easy going and easy to get along with. All of your tests will be online outside of class. There will be a few papers and group projects but they are easy. You must show up to class though to pass. Take him for an A!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Lecture heavy--Caring

comment: He is great! He is really knowledgeable about the topic of training. The class is not too difficult and he tries to make it fun. I wish he taught more classes at KSU!

Mr. Stewart is fantastic! He makes Training and Development (at 6:30-9:15 pm) bearable. All 4 tests are online (Quizlet), 2 group projects, and a few small assignments. He is not a harsh grader and he truly wants everyone to succeed! I had a great time in his class!
